caption.p: Predicted juvenile recruitment (ratio of hatch‐year [HY] to after‐hatch‐year [AHY] birds) of whooping cranes during an 11‐year solar cycle for two atmospheric CO 2 concentration scenarios. Top dotted line represents long‐term mean recruitment (0.137) and bottom dotted line represents required recruitment (0.103) needed to maintain a stable population (λ ≥ 1) given the long‐term mean annual survival of 90.6%. Points represent mean predictions and vertical bars 95% confidence intervals
